# Creating docker images inside minikube's docker environment
## Linux
eval $(minikube docker-env)

## Windows
minikube docker-env --shell cmd

# Build Docker Image
docker build -t cellcraft-ai-backend:latest .

# Run Docker Image
docker run --env-file .env -p 8000:8000 cellcraft-ai-backend:latest


aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-2 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 777064612419.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com

docker tag cellcraft-ai-backend:latest 777064612419.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/cellcraft-ai:backend-latest
docker push 777064612419.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/cellcraft-ai:backend-latest


aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-2
kubectl create secret docker-registry cellcraft-ecr-secret ^
  --docker-server=777064612419.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com ^
  --docker-username=AWS ^
  --docker- ^
  --docker-email=none@example.com
